entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 30 January 2023
